TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_balunga, title = balunga, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/balunga} }

S.FORM: == balunga輪船 == sakaylabu nu sapihaka 輪機室發動機 balunga han u kikay ku sapihaka tu balungaan, u mukin namin ku sangan. yu mahida u malumanay nu balungaan u hudhud ku sapicuduh tu hekal nu kulupila a hudhudan nu balunga. aydaay nu balunga u uo-lun a kikay ku mihakaay, ya nyi-zan-ci atu he-tun-li mala balungaay nu baluhayay a mahakaay. katukuh tu tusepcaynem mihcaan, hatiniay tu nu kitakidan nu balunga malakuuyt tu 49,000 nu balungaan, nitupin tu ba'ket makaala tu 18 yi tun, tuwal pasintu u siml nu balunga, siplu pasintu u mitipinay tu tudan nu balunga, caylu pasintu u huo-kuy nu balungaan. kayngung micukaymas tu tabakiay nu balungan sapinanam i bayubayuan atu sapamucu tu tuudan atu sapipadan tu i pabaway nu hitayan. tusepcaylim mihcaan, itini i kitakidan nu caysepsip mihcaan nu kayngung, nu Pey-han a hitayan nu kayngung ku sayadahay nu balungaan makaala tu "siwnempic", kilul sa u Cung-hua-zen-min-kunhe-kuo a hityan nu kayngung makaala tu " piccaysip" balungaan, Amilika a kayngung makaala tu " siwcaylim" balungaan, Yi-lang kayngung makaala tu " lusiwpic" balungaan, atu E'-luo-se-kayngung " lulimtu" balungaan. ayaw nu tabakiay a kayngungan palecad han makaala tu walwal nu balungaan. 2016年為止, 88艘. likisi歷史 balungan idaw ku ahebalay atu makedecay a sasakamuen, balungan idaw ku tusaay u cacuduhen nanay, cacay han nu mukasi emeken nanay tu kuku' tu sapad tu sacuduh, cacay han u kulupila ku sapicuduh. makedecay a nakamuan tu balungan u pasimalan nanay a kikay ku sapicuduh, u silahuday nu balungaan. i caywalseppic mihcaan, Amilika ci Luo-puo-te'. Hu'-e-tun misanga tu kitakid nu sayaway nu silahuday a kikayan nu balungaan. itini, ina balunga malalitinay nu minayatay nu sawsawniay nu minayatay a kikayan. . aydaay a nipatahekalan tu balungaan, sayaway a nikasilahecian u silahuday nu kikayay a silahuday a kakayan nu balungaan itida i caypicpicnem mihcaan itida i Fa-kuo a tasasa i nanum. caywalseppic mihcaan, Amilik sitangahay a tademaw ci Luo-puo-te'. Hu-e-tun ci nida ku sayaway a malaheci ku sangan tu silahuday nu kikayan a balungaan sikawaw micukaymas tu sasapisiwbayan. caywalnemlim mihcaan, Cung-kuo sayaway a silahuday nu kikayan a balungaan u Hun-haw-haw malingatu micukaymas. . kasasiduma種類 ina balunga u sakalecad nu caculilan a kakuan ku sangan, ina kakenihan u sakakapah nu kasasiduma uyni han Paul tatu Presles nipatahekal) malecad ku balucu' nu misikiay a tademaw tina balungaan. (這也是Paulet和Presles : u amelikay nu balunga: yadahay nu udipan nu balungaan(pasu misetulay nu balungaan), adidiay sakaynanum a malatusaay nu balunga , peaw-mem-siw-ing-cin atu sibaliay nu balunga, sakay nanum a sisapaday nu balungaan, ti-men-syw-ing balunga . 高速艇:多體船 , . misatebungay i bayu nu balunga: pabeliay a misatebunay nu balungaan, mikuwanay tu nikatungduh, aenenga babi', mihuwaday tu balunga, caayay pilenemay atu pangkiw nu milenemay amisatebunay, sakaypapasimalan nu balungaan, munabaway a siidaay nu sukuan papatahekalan nu papadengan. . sapibuting nu balunga漁船 limaen nanay ku sapihaka a misalilay tu bating nu balunga, mihaliyutay nu salil a mibutingay nu balunga, situwasuay mibutingay nu balunga, mitengtengay pacemutay nu balunga mikuliay nu balunga. . minatuay misakakawaway nu balungaan 港灣作業船隻 sitabakiay a dingsing nu balungaan, mikutkutay tu lanu' nu balungaan, mialaay tu tuudan nu balungaan, pacumuday tu nanum nu balungaan, mabawbaway a mutiyungay nu balungaan, mihuwaday tu ba'ketay nu balungaan, mitupinay tu balungaan. . mitupinay tu maacakay nu balungaan: muculilay nu mitupinay tu tuudan nu balungaan, mipatudutay nu balungaan, mitupinay tu huokuy nu balungaan, miwawiisay nu balungaan, RO-RO balunga, sakay pilentungan nu balungaan, mitupinay tu kasay nu balungaan, sakay katakatalanan atu ahemaway nu kadidengay nu balungaan. ,Ro-Ro船, . sakaysimal nu balungaan: simal nu balungan, sumi nu balungan, hua-sye balungaan. . labang nu balunga: pitucekan nu balunga, sapidangay nu balunga atu picidekan nu sasiwbayan nu balungaan (STP ships), bayubayuan midangay nu balungaan, miduducay tu dadipasan nu balungaan atu minaminatuan nu midangay a balungaan. (STP ships), papahanhanan nu aidangan a balungaan: picidekan nu cacukaymasan nu balunga: sakay demiadan atu sapikinkiwan nu balunga, sapiditekaw tu ilabuay nu nanum a balungaan atu mamipeci' tu suleda nu balungaan. . sapicelen nu duguan: sakaypikulian miditek, kakinkiwan tu ke-sya, laliwkuan atu sakay nanum nu kakinsaan. . hitay nu balunga: pasu i nanumay atu i hekalay nu balungaan. laleku 結構 itini i canancanan nu tabakiay adidiay a balungaan, idaw namin ku papacumudan. u balunga idaw namin ku udip nu balunga, idaw namin ku sapicuduh a canancanan, yu sumamad nu bulunga sapicuduh u lahud ku saculil, aydaay a balunga u kikay namin ku mikawaway, idaw henay ku u nei-zan-ci atu he-hun a paludan. hatidaay tu nu balungaan idaw namin ku papacunaan. labu nu balunga idaw ku nipibacal, papadenga tu tuudan, pabaw a sangan, atu miaw atu sapimelec nu tuudan, nika caay kaw idaw namin ku mahiniay a sanga nu balungaan. .udip nu balunga 船體 munabaw ku balunga i nanum, u ba'ket nu balunga amikiahemaw tu nanum. nu cacayay a babalungaan cacay u udip nu balunga (masacacayay nu balunga, monohull), hakiya idaw ku tusaay a udip nu balunga(tusaay a udip nu balunga, catamaran), hakiya idaw ku tuluay a udip nu balungaan(tuluay a udip nu balunga, trimaran).milakuuytay nu tuluay a udip nu balungaan inai', nika u nipikinkiwan namakaala tu limaay a udipan nu balunga. nu yadahay a udip nu balungaan, u i masaenalay nu nanum muculil, a u atekakay nu mukinan malalitin. (單體船,monohull), ,trimaran). . yadah ku nikakenihan a udip nu balunga, i nuayawan u udip nu tangah, hatidaay tu nu yadah a balungaan idaw namin ku masamaliay a tangahan. makasasa u ukak nu udip a balunga, sipakay nu ayawan makatukuh i nikudan. nikudan u kikul a udip nu balunga, hatidaay tu nu nikudan a balungaan masaenal a kitidaan, u kikul han. hinaadih kita tu u kulupila nanay nu sapicuduh, sapikuwan tu sakatacuwacuwa a papacunaan, metalaw tu nikangayangay mahuyahuy. duma nu picidekan atu balungan tu sakalecad, mahida u pibutingan nu dugu atu sakasunian. . misimsim henay tu sangan nu balunga tu liw-sin-cin-li-sye atu liw-ti-tun-li-sye a yukiwan, u kasaetiman a liw-ti-cin-li-sye tu yukiw u sapacukel tina balungaan a ba'ketan, tina nipitupin tu ba'ketay kya mahida tu ku nikalecad. Liw-sin-tun-li-sye a nipitiyang pasu taneng milebu tu nikatiyungan nu cakepan, demiadan atu mitalinged a nikalalidan. . yu saumamaday nu balungaan (hatu aidangan nu balungaan) hakiya u kasuy ku sanga tu kaku nu balunga. aydaay a balunga u mukin ku zayliw nu sangan, nu amelikay nu balungaan hakiya u li a zayliwan, paypay a balungaan atu sasaidangan nu balungaan u hu-he zayliw, idaw ku duma a balungaan u malamelay nu lala' ku sangan tu balungaan, u nikalamel tu lala' ku udip nu balunga a zayliwan. mimucuay tu tuu'd nu balung, papadengan tu tuu'd, pabaw nu sanga 貨艙,艙室及上層建築 tabakiay nu balungaan idaw namin ku sapad atu kakitidaan. pibutingan nu balunga atu mimucuay nu balunga idaw ku cacayay atu pinaay nu papadenga tu sukuan. tabakiay nu balungaan idaw namin ku papacunaan tu kikikayan, palud atu yadahay nu duguan a sukuan. i balunga idaw ku papahalhalan tu simal, kunggu nu simal atu sakaynanum a pasimalan atu nanum nu sukuan. mamipenecay tu sapitupin a sukuan taneng misumad tu sakaydangan, kya sakay kapah aca. . tungduh nu sanga i pabaw nu sapadan ku sanga. aydaay a mimucuay nu balungaan, u sangan i pabaw itida namin i nikuda nu balunga. itini i sapitupin tu labanga nu balungaan atu hitay nu balungaan, pabaw a sanga nu balunga minayat katukuh i nuayawan ku sanga. .

== balonga輪船 == sakaylabo no sapihaka 輪機室發動機 balonga han o kikay ko sapihaka to balongaan, o mokin namin ko sangan. yo mahida o malomanay no balongaan o hodhod ko sapicodoh to hekal no kolopila a hodhodan no balonga. aydaay no balonga o oo-lon a kikay ko mihakaay, ya nyi-zan-ci ato he-ton-li mala balongaay no balohayay a mahakaay. katokoh to tosepcaynem mihcaan, hatiniay to no kitakidan no balonga malakooyt to 49,000 no balongaan, nitopin to ba'ket makaala to 18 yi ton, towal pasinto o siml no balonga, siplo pasinto o mitipinay to todan no balonga, caylo pasinto o hoo-koy no balongaan. kayngong micokaymas to tabakiay no balongan sapinanam i bayobayoan ato sapamoco to toodan ato sapipadan to i pabaway no hitayan. tosepcaylim mihcaan, itini i kitakidan no caysepsip mihcaan no kayngong, no Pey-han a hitayan no kayngong ko sayadahay no balongaan makaala to "siwnempic", kilol sa o Cong-hoa-zen-min-konhe-koo a hityan no kayngong makaala to " piccaysip" balongaan, Amilika a kayngong makaala to " siwcaylim" balongaan, Yi-lang kayngong makaala to " losiwpic" balongaan, ato E'-loo-se-kayngong " lolimto" balongaan. ayaw no tabakiay a kayngongan palecad han makaala to walwal no balongaan. 2016年為止, 88艘. likisi歷史 balongan idaw ko ahebalay ato makedecay a sasakamoen, balongan idaw ko tosaay o cacodohen nanay, cacay han no mokasi emeken nanay to koko' to sapad to sacodoh, cacay han o kolopila ko sapicodoh. makedecay a nakamoan to balongan o pasimalan nanay a kikay ko sapicodoh, o silahoday no balongaan. i caywalseppic mihcaan, Amilika ci Loo-poo-te'. Ho'-e-ton misanga to kitakid no sayaway no silahoday a kikayan no balongaan. itini, ina balonga malalitinay no minayatay no sawsawniay no minayatay a kikayan. . aydaay a nipatahekalan to balongaan, sayaway a nikasilahecian o silahoday no kikayay a silahoday a kakayan no balongaan itida i caypicpicnem mihcaan itida i Fa-koo a tasasa i nanom. caywalseppic mihcaan, Amilik sitangahay a tademaw ci Loo-poo-te'. Ho-e-ton ci nida ko sayaway a malaheci ko sangan to silahoday no kikayan a balongaan sikawaw micokaymas to sasapisiwbayan. caywalnemlim mihcaan, Cong-koo sayaway a silahoday no kikayan a balongaan o Hon-haw-haw malingato micokaymas. . kasasidoma種類 ina balonga o sakalecad no cacolilan a kakoan ko sangan, ina kakenihan o sakakapah no kasasidoma oyni han Paol tato Presles nipatahekal) malecad ko baloco' no misikiay a tademaw tina balongaan. (這也是Paolet和Presles : o amelikay no balonga: yadahay no odipan no balongaan(paso misetolay no balongaan), adidiay sakaynanom a malatosaay no balonga , peaw-mem-siw-ing-cin ato sibaliay no balonga, sakay nanom a sisapaday no balongaan, ti-men-syw-ing balonga . 高速艇:多體船 , . misatebongay i bayo no balonga: pabeliay a misatebonay no balongaan, mikowanay to nikatongdoh, aenenga babi', mihowaday to balonga, caayay pilenemay ato pangkiw no milenemay amisatebonay, sakaypapasimalan no balongaan, monabaway a siidaay no sokoan papatahekalan no papadengan. . sapiboting no balonga漁船 limaen nanay ko sapihaka a misalilay to bating no balonga, mihaliyotay no salil a mibotingay no balonga, sitowasoay mibotingay no balonga, mitengtengay pacemotay no balonga mikoliay no balonga. . minatoay misakakawaway no balongaan 港灣作業船隻 sitabakiay a dingsing no balongaan, mikotkotay to lano' no balongaan, mialaay to toodan no balongaan, pacomoday to nanom no balongaan, mabawbaway a motiyongay no balongaan, mihowaday to ba'ketay no balongaan, mitopinay to balongaan. . mitopinay to maacakay no balongaan: mocolilay no mitopinay to toodan no balongaan, mipatodotay no balongaan, mitopinay to hookoy no balongaan, miwawiisay no balongaan, RO-RO balonga, sakay pilentongan no balongaan, mitopinay to kasay no balongaan, sakay katakatalanan ato ahemaway no kadidengay no balongaan. ,Ro-Ro船, . sakaysimal no balongaan: simal no balongan, somi no balongan, hoa-sye balongaan. . labang no balonga: pitocekan no balonga, sapidangay no balonga ato picidekan no sasiwbayan no balongaan (STP ships), bayobayoan midangay no balongaan, midodocay to dadipasan no balongaan ato minaminatoan no midangay a balongaan. (STP ships), papahanhanan no aidangan a balongaan: picidekan no cacokaymasan no balonga: sakay demiadan ato sapikinkiwan no balonga, sapiditekaw to ilaboay no nanom a balongaan ato mamipeci' to soleda no balongaan. . sapicelen no dogoan: sakaypikolian miditek, kakinkiwan to ke-sya, laliwkoan ato sakay nanom no kakinsaan. . hitay no balonga: paso i nanomay ato i hekalay no balongaan. laleko 結構 itini i canancanan no tabakiay adidiay a balongaan, idaw namin ko papacomodan. o balonga idaw namin ko odip no balonga, idaw namin ko sapicodoh a canancanan, yo somamad no bolonga sapicodoh o lahod ko sacolil, aydaay a balonga o kikay namin ko mikawaway, idaw henay ko o nei-zan-ci ato he-hon a palodan. hatidaay to no balongaan idaw namin ko papaconaan. labo no balonga idaw ko nipibacal, papadenga to toodan, pabaw a sangan, ato miaw ato sapimelec no toodan, nika caay kaw idaw namin ko mahiniay a sanga no balongaan. .odip no balonga 船體 monabaw ko balonga i nanom, o ba'ket no balonga amikiahemaw to nanom. no cacayay a babalongaan cacay o odip no balonga (masacacayay no balonga, monoholl), hakiya idaw ko tosaay a odip no balonga(tosaay a odip no balonga, catamaran), hakiya idaw ko toloay a odip no balongaan(toloay a odip no balonga, trimaran).milakooytay no toloay a odip no balongaan inai', nika o nipikinkiwan namakaala to limaay a odipan no balonga. no yadahay a odip no balongaan, o i masaenalay no nanom mocolil, a o atekakay no mokinan malalitin. (單體船,monoholl), ,trimaran). . yadah ko nikakenihan a odip no balonga, i noayawan o odip no tangah, hatidaay to no yadah a balongaan idaw namin ko masamaliay a tangahan. makasasa o okak no odip a balonga, sipakay no ayawan makatokoh i nikodan. nikodan o kikol a odip no balonga, hatidaay to no nikodan a balongaan masaenal a kitidaan, o kikol han. hinaadih kita to o kolopila nanay no sapicodoh, sapikowan to sakatacowacowa a papaconaan, metalaw to nikangayangay mahoyahoy. doma no picidekan ato balongan to sakalecad, mahida o pibotingan no dogo ato sakasonian. . misimsim henay to sangan no balonga to liw-sin-cin-li-sye ato liw-ti-ton-li-sye a yokiwan, o kasaetiman a liw-ti-cin-li-sye to yokiw o sapacokel tina balongaan a ba'ketan, tina nipitopin to ba'ketay kya mahida to ko nikalecad. Liw-sin-ton-li-sye a nipitiyang paso taneng milebo to nikatiyongan no cakepan, demiadan ato mitalinged a nikalalidan. . yo saomamaday no balongaan (hato aidangan no balongaan) hakiya o kasoy ko sanga to kako no balonga. aydaay a balonga o mokin ko zayliw no sangan, no amelikay no balongaan hakiya o li a zayliwan, paypay a balongaan ato sasaidangan no balongaan o ho-he zayliw, idaw ko doma a balongaan o malamelay no lala' ko sangan to balongaan, o nikalamel to lala' ko odip no balonga a zayliwan. mimocoay to too'd no balong, papadengan to too'd, pabaw no sanga 貨艙,艙室及上層建築 tabakiay no balongaan idaw namin ko sapad ato kakitidaan. pibotingan no balonga ato mimocoay no balonga idaw ko cacayay ato pinaay no papadenga to sokoan. tabakiay no balongaan idaw namin ko papaconaan to kikikayan, palod ato yadahay no dogoan a sokoan. i balonga idaw ko papahalhalan to simal, konggo no simal ato sakaynanom a pasimalan ato nanom no sokoan. mamipenecay to sapitopin a sokoan taneng misomad to sakaydangan, kya sakay kapah aca. . tongdoh no sanga i pabaw no sapadan ko sanga. aydaay a mimocoay no balongaan, o sangan i pabaw itida namin i nikoda no balonga. itini i sapitopin to labanga no balongaan ato hitay no balongaan, pabaw a sanga no balonga minayat katokoh i noayawan ko sanga. .
